story_galar_02_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You’ve got everyone’s cheers backin’ you! Give it
your all!
story_galar_02_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hey, hey, hey! Show him what you’ve got, kiddos!
story_galar_02_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
There’s no such thing as losing when you’ve got
Marnie and Piers cheerin’ for you!
story_galar_02_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
If you can’t do something on your own, you can
work together with others to be even stronger!
story_galar_02_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: Exactly! You can only do so much on your own.
story_galar_02_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
But if you work together as a team, you can
overcome any obstacle!
story_galar_02_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
And that’s something I want everyone to
remember!
